changeSet.sql: create table if not exists food_donation ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, active bit default 1 null, title varchar(100) null, description varchar(500) null, donation_date datetime null, donation_expiration_date datetime null, status varchar(50) null, category varchar(50) null, communication_method varchar(50) null, image_url varchar(2048) null, quantity float null, food_unit_id bigint, food_category_id bigint, food_expiration_date datetime, user_id bigint null, city_id bigint null, constraint food_donation_food_unit_id_fk foreign key (food_unit_id) references food_unit (id), constraint food_donation_food_category_id_fk foreign key (food_category_id) references food_category (id), constraint food_donation_user_id_fk foreign key (user_id) references user_ (id), constraint food_donation_city_id_fk foreign key (city_id) references city (id) );
